M12/1/A1PUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX




     22120239

PUNJABI A1 – STANDARD LEVEL – PAPER 1
PANJABI A1 – NIVEAU MOYEN – ÉPREUVE 1
PUNJABI A1 – NIVEL MEDIO – PRUEBA 1

Thursday 10 May 2012 (morning)
Jeudi 10 mai 2012 (matin)
Jueves 10 de mayo de 2012 (mañana)

1 hour 30 minutes / 1 heure 30 minutes / 1 hora 30 minutos


INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES

 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a commentary on one passage only. It is not compulsory for you to respond directly to
  the guiding questions provided. However, you may use them if you wish.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [25 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS

 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez un commentaire sur un seul des passages. Le commentaire ne doit pas nécessairement
  répondre aux questions d’orientation fournies. Vous pouvez toutefois les utiliser si vous le
  désirez.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [25 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS

 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un comentario sobre un solo fragmento. No es obligatorio responder directamente a
  las preguntas que se ofrecen a modo de guía. Sin embargo, puede usarlas si lo desea.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [25 puntos].




2212-0239                                                                                   4 pages/páginas
                                                             © International Baccalaureate Organization 2012
                                                          –2–                    M12/1/A1PUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX

hyT iliKAW iv`coN iksy ie`k qy it`pxI ilKo [

1.

                    AwpxIAW swrIAW socW pUro ny f`k leIAW, qy auh isrP lwjo ƒ socx l`g peI [
                    gItIAW igx igx pUro ny rwq k`FI [ auh dUjI Blk vyly dw Qhu lWdI rhI ik ikhVy ku vyly lwjo dy Gr
            vwlI bu`FI Awpxy pu`qr ƒ KyqW iv`c rotI dyx geI hovygI ? aus ny do ku kory Kys isr auqy r`Ky, qy lIVy dI kMnI
            ivc, kwgz iv`c vlHytI hoeI cutkI ku suAwh bMnH leI [
      5             lwjo dy Gr dw BIiVAw hoieAw bUhw h`QW nwl KolHx ligAW pUro ny swry pIr PkIr iDAwey [ pUro ƒ crokxy
            Bu`ly hoey dyvI dyviqAW dy nW cyqy Awey, aus qoN pihlW iksy vI idn r`b qy Kudw dw nW lYx ligAW pUro kih dyNdI
            huMdI ik r`b auhdw mqrieAw ipau ey, Kudw dI auh mqryeI DI ey, iksy vI r`b-Kudw ƒ auhdI iK`c-pIV nhIN,
            pr A`j pUro ƒ ie`k sihm Aw igAw, aus ny iJjk ijhI iv`c iksy r`b rhIm ƒ cyqy kIqw ik ikvyN auhdw myl
            iek`lI lwjo nwl ho jwvy [
     10             dupihrW dw B`qy vylw pUro ƒ bhuV ipAw sI [ bu`FI Awpxy pu`qr ƒ rotI dyx geI hoeI sI qy ‘k`lI kwrI
            lwjo vyhVy iv`c ie`k AlwxI mMjI auqy peI hoeI sI [
                    “AMmW ikQy vy ?” pUro ny vyhVy ivc pYr pWidAW hI pu`C ilAw [
                    “KyqW vl geI ey [” lwjo ny k`lH Kys vycx vwlI ƒ q`k ky ikhw [ KysW vwlI nwl jwgI hoeI lwjo dI
            idlcspI lwjo dy mUMh auqoN peI lBdI sI [ lwjo mMjI auqy auT ky bih geI [
     15             pUro ƒ ieko vwrgI AwpxI mW dI Skl, AwpxI BYx dI Skl, AwpxI BwbI dI Skl lwjo dy mUMh ivcoN
            id`sI [ pUro lwjo dy gl nwl cmut geI [
                    pUro dy AMdroN rox auiTAw, aus ƒ l`gw, auhdw rox kMDW ƒ pwV dyvygw, auhdw rox KyqW ƒ cIr jweygw,
            auhdw rox ipMfW ƒ lMG jweygw, auhdw rox SihrW ƒ t`p jweygw, auhdw rox ---- [
                    pUro ny Awpxw rox sMG iv`coN vI bwhr nw inklx id`qw [ “qUM lwjo eyN, myrI BwbI ----” pUro ny swry
     20     gubwr Awpxy AMdr vlHyt ky AwiKAw [
                    qUM pUro eyN ? lwjo ny auhdI CwqI nwloN lih ky auhdw mUMh vyiKAw, pr lwjo ny pihlW kdy pUro ƒ
            q`ikAw nhIN sI ju pCwxdI, iPr vI lwjo ƒ pUro dw mUMh sgvyN dw sgvW pUro dy Brw vrgw lgw, Awpxy KwvMd
            vrgw ---- lwjo ƒ ie`k gc Br AwieAw, ijvyN auh Awpxy KwvMd dy swhmxy A`KW nw cu`k skdI hovy, lwjo pUro
            dIAW l`qW qy Fih peI [
     25             lwjo dy AMdr peIAW jo jo bIqdIAW sn, KOry pUro dIAW AwpxIAW nwVW ivcoN peIAW lMGdIAW sn [ pUro
            kol kuJ vI puCx gocrw nhIN sI [ pUro ny Gut Gut ky lwjo ƒ klyjy nwl lwieAw [
                    “koeI Aw jweygw lwjo, myrI g`l sux [” pUro ƒ smyN dI surq AweI [ lwjo dIAW Bu`bW nhIN sn rukdIAW,
            lwjo dw swh nhIN sI swh iv`c rldw [
                    “auh ikhVy vyly prq AwauNdI ey ?” pUro ny Pyr puiCAw [
     30             “mYƒ kuJ nhIN pqw, mYƒ Awpxy kol lY c`l [” lwjo is`DI nhIN sI huMdI, pUro dIAW l`qW nwloN lihMdI
            nhIN sI [
                    “lYx qW AweI hW, hor krn kI AweI hW, myrI g`l qy sux !”
                    pUro ny moiFAW qoN PV ky lwjo dw mUMh au~cw kIqw [
                    “hwey mYƒ lY c`l !”
     35             “pr qUM sMBl ky bYT, koeI auqoN Aw jweygw [”
                    “mYƒ lY ky n`s c`l, mYN swrI aumr qyrI cwkr bx ky rvHWgI [”


                                                                                            AimRqw pRIqm, ipMjr (2000)

      – lwjo dy idl dI hwlq d`sx leI lyKkw ikhVy ikhVy FMgW dI vrqoN krdI hY ?

      – vwrqw iv`c lwjo qy pUro dy sbMD ikvyN ibAwn kIqy gey hn ?

      – ies vwrqw iv`c lyKkw vloN vrqI geI bolI Aqy SbdwvlI qy it`pxI kro [




2212-0239                                                     Turn over / Tournez la page / Véase al dorso
                                                    –4–                       M12/1/A1PUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX

2.

                                  dosqo ! hux ip`T myrI qy AMigAwr nw Dro [

                                  dosqo ! hux ip`T myrI qy AMigAwr nw Dro [
                                  vwr jy krnw hI hY qW vwr sIny qy kro [

                                  jIx hY nw mrn myrw, Kwx hY nw pIx hY,
                                  ies AnoKI mrz dw koeI dvw dwrU kro [

                              5   son moqI ƒ kdy mYQoN nw koeI Koh lvy,
                                  nwl sIny dy lw ky r`KW gwnI dy iv`c pro [

                                  ieSk dI ies Kyf ƒ sOKw nhIN hY Kyfxw,
                                  Kyfxw qW sB qoN pihlW isr hQylI qy Dro [

                                  kOx kihMdw hY muh`bq KordI hY ijMd ƒ ?
                             10   jIx vrgI hY muh`bq, Awqmw qoN jy kro [

                                  vyvPw ienswn hY, jIvn nhIN hY vyvPw,
                                  qur igAw jo C`f ky nw aus leI hOky Bro [

                                  kOx hY ie`Qy iksy dw b`s kr lvo idn-ktI,
                                  ipAwr jy imly s`cw qW ipAwr leI kuJ vI kro [

                                                                                      kuljIq kOr, gzl (2006)


      – it`pxI kro ik ies kivqw iv`c kivqrI ny ipAwr dy mnoBwv pyS krn leI bolI dI vrqoN ikvyN kIqI hY [

      – kivqrI vloN kivqw iv`c vrqy geyy swihqk FMgW qy it`pxI kro [

      – ies kivqw dI rcnw bwry qusIN kI kihxw cwhuMdy ho ?
